attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Faith in this country's political system is at an all time low. The war in Afghanistan, the expenses scandal, the economy. We are all sick of it. It is time for change and that cannot wait until June next year! Call the election now and let the people make up their own minds

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
